item.title: Web app manifests with Hugo
item.description: To publish a web app manifest document with your Hugo site, configure a media type in your config.toml: [mediaTypes."application/manifest+json"] suffixes = ["webmanifest"] [outputFormats.Webmanifest] name = "Web App Manifest" mediaType = "application/manifest+json" baseName = "manifest" isPlainText = false rel = "alternate" isHTML = false noUgly = true permalinkable = false Create a new layout in _default/home.manifest.json with the following content: { "name": "{{ .Site.Title }}", "short_name": "{{ .Site.Title }}", "start_url": ".", "display": "minimal-ui", "background_color": "#fff", "description": "{{ .
